name: Kananaskis Country Trail Guide 4th Edition Volume 4
categories: Kananaskis Country Trail Guide 4th Edition Vo
description: Kananaskis Country is a huge multi-use recreation region in Alberta with parks, campgrounds, and hiking trails. This guide zones in on a specific part of Kananaskis Country, and covers the Sheep River, Gorge Creek, and Threepoint Creek (also known as north fork) areas. It includes clear and detailed trail descriptions with maps and colour photos, so that novice or experienced hikers can safely walk, backpack, and scramble their way through meadows, forests, and mountains.
